programme.title: How Denis Ten put Kazakhstan on the map with an unlikely winter sport
programme.desc: When the limitations on a young post-Soviet nation couldn’t deter young Kazakh figure skater Denis Ten from defying the giants in his sport.

programme.title: How Japanese teen Ayumu Hirano defied USA’s dominance in snowboarding
programme.desc: At Sochi 2014, Japan landed historic medals in snowboard halfpipe, one of them is by a stylish teenager from the small salmon town Murakami.

programme.title: Men’s Skiathlon, Sochi 2014
programme.desc: Few sports rival the endurance needed to compete in skiathlon, and Europe's fittest legends fight for the Olympic title in Sochi.

programme.title: Badminton: Women's Doubles Gold Match | Rio 2016 Replays
programme.desc: Misaki Matsutomo/Ayaka Takahashi (JPN) 2 - 1 Christinna Pedersen/Kamilla R. Juhl (DEN)

programme.title: Badminton: Mixed Doubles Gold Match | Rio 2016 Replays
programme.desc: Tontowi Ahmad/Liliyana Natsir (INA) 2 - 0 Chan Peng Soon/Goh Liu Ying (MAS)

programme.title: Women's Bronze & Gold Medal Matches - Beach Volleyball | Tokyo 2020 Replays
programme.desc: This event took place on 06/08/2021 at the Shiokaze Park, Tokyo. April/Alix (USA) claimed Gold beating Artacho Del Solar/Clancy (AUS) 2:0 and Verge-Depre/Heidrich (SUI) the Bronze beating Graudina/Kravcenoka (LAT)

programme.title: Men's Bronze & Gold Medal Matches - Beach Volleyball | Tokyo 2020 Replays
programme.desc: This event took place on 06/08/2021 at the Shiokaze Park, Tokyo. Mol/Sorum (NOR) claimed the Gold, Krasilnikov/Stoyanovsky (ROC) Silver and Cherif/Ahmed (QAT) Bronze with a 2:0 victory over Plavins/Tocs (LAT)

programme.title: The university karate program grooming Japan’s future Olympic stars

programme.title: How water polo MVP Ashleigh Johnson smashed stereotypes
programme.desc: Not only was Johnson the first ever African American woman to compete for Team USA in water polo, she was crowned tournament MVP in Rio.
